name: places/ChIJTQeccgb0wokRskl4cegBTZQ
formattedAddress: 151 Nagle Ave, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 151 Nagle Ave, New York, NY 10040, USA

originalText.text: The customer service is excellent. They give you advise before buying the items. The quality is excellent as well, and the shipping is very fast. It’s a store where you can find high quality and elegant clothes for any occasion.

text.text: The customer service is excellent. They give you advise before buying the items. The quality is excellent as well, and the shipping is very fast. It’s a store where you can find high quality and elegant clothes for any occasion.

originalText.text:
Selling wholesale fast fashion clothing at this store pretending it’s high end. All 5 star reviews are definitely from their friends & families.

They know it & there is no denying it. They will likely respond to this being defensive & continue to lie about their bad overpriced clothing.

Owner is a thief.

Update: as predicted, shortly after my honest review, they had someone write a fake 5 star review. The thieves never stop working overtime, I see.

originalText.text: Bless Couture is my go to when in need of a unique outfit. You will not have to worry about having the same outfit as someone else when you shop here. I wore a 2 piece set to a shower recently and received nothing but compliments. The quality of the clothes is beautiful. I have pieces that are 3-4 years old that still look new. The owners are honest and will find you the best fit for your body and taste. They go above and beyond for their customers. They’ve recently revamped the entire store making it a lot more comfortable to shop and have added styles to appeal to a bigger audience.

originalText.text: I have been here in three different occasions and I must say that every single occasion resulted in 100% pure satisfaction. With the patience and knowledge of fashion by Carmen, Monica and Natasha. They have always picked out the best outfit for my fiancée. The amazing hospitality is met as soon as you walk into the boutique. You are welcome and are given the VIP treatment.  They are definitely will be our fashion advisors for our wedding. I recommend this establishment to anyone who is looking for wonderful outfits and most importantly with a wonderful and friendly staff

originalText.text:
They didn’t let me FaceTime my cousin in the store. Something about they don’t want family/friends to tell the customer that the cheap quality of their clothes does not justify how overpriced this store is.

Very pretentious owner.

Anyone who knows quality and fashion knows this is “Necessary Clothing” quality clothes for Nordstrom prices.

What’s sad is she Dominican & ripping off her own community of people.

Get over yourself, Bless Couture.

UPDATE: they are still up charging their She-in quality clothes & have no shame about it. They know it & have the audacity to believe they have an ethical business model. This company preys on people who don’t know any better about quality clothes and what justifies as items that should be sold at hundreds of dollars. There is no silk, cashmere or other high quality fabrics in this store. Shame on them.
